doctor-1.text: Greetings. Doctor Thomas Wade at your service. How may I be of help?

responses.doctor-3: What's your reason for being here?

doctor-1a.text: Hello again. How may I be of help?

responses.doctor-3: I forgot, why are you here?

end-1.message: I could use your services. Why don't you join me?

doctor-2.text: I'm a medical doctor at Arkham Hospital, trained in both emergency first aid and surgery.

responses.doctor-3: And what's your reason for being here?

end-1.message: Ok, I could definitely use your services. Why don't you join me?

end-2.message: Sorry, I need to go. I'll talk to you later.

doctor-3.text: I've known Professor Nymian for years, and he wanted a medical doctor available for his team as they could encounter unknown dangers.

end-1.message: Ok, I could definitely use your services. Why don't you join me?

end-2.message: Sorry, I need to go. I'll talk to you later.

doctor-4.text: Sorry, but it appears you already have a full party. Come back after you have freed up some space.

doctor-5.text: Yes? How can I be of service?

responses.doctor-6: I don't have need of you now.

doctor-6.text: Ok, I'll be in the museum if you need me again.
